title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, providing sync/async APIs and chat helpers.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, usable in Node or browsers via proxy.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package enabling Ollama models as LLM & chat components.

title: llama-index-llms-ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM integration to use Ollama models for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chat, file uploads, and admin panel.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that forwards user prompts to a local Ollama instance and streams replies.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and embeddings support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI wrapper around Ollama with prompts library and conversation management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama completions inline like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama with idiomatic client and streaming support.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal React chatbot component that connects to Ollama via its REST API.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Official Rust crate for Ollama with tokio-based async client and streaming completions.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ and streaming.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected blocks and insert generated text.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin for summarizing notes and Q&A using an Ollama backend.
